content:
Im using version 1.9.2.
My default for stream is no notification, so all checkbox are unchecked.
We have a support-stream, there I enabled all notification except Audible desktop notification. Furthermore the "Mute stream"-Checkbox is obviously unchecked. How ever I doesn't become an notification. Neither mobile nor email.
For @Mention and PM I get Mobile and E-Mail-Notifications.
What's wrong? Can I prove my settings in the database?
@niels so, for both email and push notifications, by default we only trigger them if you were offline at the time of the message.
(with a pretty strict definitition -- e.g. if you haven't touched the computer in 5 minutes you're offline)
There's a setting for mobile notifications to get them even when online that I'd recommend you set for testing (it's incorrectly categorized as a PM feature)

@Tim Abbott Thanks for clarification. That explains the current behavior. After checking all setting in the webclient I got the expected notifications, for some messages. The day before I got no message. However now it works, as described so it's difficult to clear it completely.
@niels ok, well report back if you reproduce something in the future that seems broken.
